document.masterDocTitle: A review of the F. serena - subgroup of Fannia Robineau-Desvoidy (Diptera: Fanniidae), with the description of two new species from China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A review of the F. serena - subgroup of Fannia Robineau-Desvoidy (Diptera: Fanniidae), with the description of two new species from China

materialsCitation.collectorName: Coll. M. F. Wang. Distribution & Baimashi

paragraph.materialsCitation:

27.v.1984
, Coll. M.F. Wang. Distribution : Shanxi (Type locality: Yingxian County : Baimashi ).
